name: Elysia
greetingText: How have you been, Miss 16  hours away?
wishText: Oh, what a month it has been...hasnt it. So many lessons learnt and even more memories shared. To say, I miss you, would certainly be an understatement. Yet, I dont know why I feel this way, when I dont think I could love you more.... Well, Lets continue growing together.. shall we?
